name: Truck Delivery 3D
description:
Truck Delivery 3D tests your truck driving skills. Challenging truck driving with difficult load in tough environment. You need to deliver various types of cargo from start to finish. Be careful not to drop any of them!
Truck Delivery 3D features:
- Multiple levels
- Beautiful 3D graphics
- Multiple cargo types
- Smooth gameplay
- Unique Truck driving experience, including a Truck trailer!
- Realistic physics
- Virtual steering wheel
- Tilt control system


More levels coming soon! If you have any technical issues, please write to me.
e-mail : ahmetkocak998@gmail.com
